caption:
The photograph features a marine setting with a close-up of a red navigational buoy numbered "2". Atop this buoy is a large nest made from an assortment of twigs and branches. A bird with speckled plumage is perched on the edge of the nest, which is positioned just below a small, beacon-like light that forms part of the buoy's structure.

In the background, the calm sea stretches out, meeting a hazy, clear sky on the horizon. On the sea, two sailboats can be seen in the distance; one is closer to the left and features a white sail, while another is further away to the right. The sea appears tranquil, suggesting a peaceful maritime scene. The overall composition balances the artificial structure of the buoy and natural elements like the bird and its nest, against the expansive backdrop of water and sky.
title: Nesting on top of a chesapeake bay channel marker
